Functions
setParams
sub setParams

This method sets the parameters for get_logout_uri command.  This module uses `request` method of OxdClient module for sending request to oxd-server

Parameters
string $oxd_id

(Required) oxd Id from Client registration

string $id_token_hint

(Optional) ID Token Hint. oxd Server will use last used ID Token

string $post_logout_redirect_uri

(Optional) Uri to Redirect after Logout

string $state

(Optional) State

string $session_state

(Optional) Session State

string $protection_access_token

Protection Acccess Token. OPTIONAL for `oxd-server` but REQUIRED for `oxd-https-extension`

Returns

void

This module uses `getResponseObject` method of OxdClient module for getting response from oxd.

Example response from getResponseObject:

{ "status": "ok", "data": { "uri": "https://idp-hostname/oxauth/restv1/end_session?id_token_hint=eyJraWQiOgt6yxMMltA" } }
